entry.title: Onomy Public Testnet Starting Oct 10th
entry.content: Onomy Testnet will open to the public on October 10th. A big and exciting next step for the Onomy network. Our Validator is already Online and running. We are looking forward to see the network grow.
entry.summary: Onomy Testnet will open to the public on October 10th. A big and exciting next step for the Onomy network. Our Validator is already Onl

entry.title: Iagon
entry.content:
We have begun discussions with the team at Iagon. Iagon is creating a decentralised storage chain providing a new generation of encrypted cloud storage. We are excited about working with and becoming a resource partner for the Iagon network.

Learn more about Iagon

entry.title: Onomy TestNet Validator Online
entry.content:
Validator Online

Our Validator is Online for the Second Onomy Testnet. We are looking forward to continue helping build the strength of the Onomy network.
See it on the Onomy Blockchain Explorer

Learn more about Onomy
entry.summary:

entry.title: Onomy Test Network
entry.content:
Onomy Test Network #2 Coming Soon

We have been following the progress of the Onomy Protocol closely. Although up for a short time, we have contributed to the successful first Test Net and are geared up and ready to run a Validator for the 2nd Onomy Test Net.

entry.title: About
entry.content: Lila Holdings is dedicated to using our extensive technical experience to contribute to the security and growth of Proof of Stake networks. Our team has decades of experience in the business, financial, and system administration fields. By staking our own funds, we are incentivized in keeping our validators running 24/7. In doing so, all of our delegators benefit right along with us.
entry.summary: Lila Holdings is dedicated to using our extensive technical experience to contribute to the security and growth of Proof of Stake network
